definition: to carry (hanging down from the hand)/to lift/to put forward/to mention/to raise (an issue)/upwards character stroke/lifting brush stroke (in painting)/scoop for measuring liquid

sentences.english: And Vergeer admits that "sometimes it's tiring always trying to improve.
sentences.chinese: 沃吉尔承认，“有时会对无尽的提高而感到厌烦。”

sentences.english: Popularization of compulsory pre-school education should be given priority.
sentences.chinese: 义务教育应优先提高学前教育。

sentences.english: Objective Establish the quality standards for Jiere Xiaoyan Capsule.
sentences.chinese: 目的提高解热消炎胶囊的质量标准。

sentences.english: As a result, their spoken English might not improve.
sentences.chinese: 所以，他们的英语口语可能得不到提高。

sentences.english: Objective To improve the performance level and awareness of CT imaging with brain abscess .
sentences.chinese: 目的提高对脑脓肿CT影像学表现的认识和诊断水平。

sentences.english: The stability of colour and depth of shade were improved by after-treatment.
sentences.chinese: 通过后处理提高了热转印布样的颜色稳定性和深度。

sentences.english: The connection can still be used, just with heightened security in mind.
sentences.chinese: 连接仍然可用，只是需要从思想上提高安全意识。

sentences.english: Serviceability of 100% wool high-count worsted fabric was improved.
sentences.chinese: 提高纯毛精纺高支纱织物的服用性能。

sentences.english: The experimental data showed that the results were better than those determined by partial least squares.
sentences.chinese: 结果表明，经小波变换后处理结果回收率明显提高。

sentences.english: The government has also engaged Western experts in crisis management.
sentences.chinese: 中国政府还致力于提高政府公共危机管理水平。

sentences.english: The unrefined Veratryl alcohol extracted from fresh grape peel by organic solvent could significantly enhance Lip activity.
sentences.chinese: 有机萃取葡萄皮渣粗提藜芦醇可提高酶活。

sentences.english: Some techniques could be applied to improve its quality and to strengthen its Maotai-flavor styles.
sentences.chinese: 可采取一些方法提高质量，突出酱香风格。

sentences.english: Adding additives in calcium-based sorbents could improve the sulfur capture capacity.
sentences.chinese: 这可以通过添加助剂等来提高固硫率。

sentences.english: To enhance the correctness of curtain, card, material and warrant.
sentences.chinese: 提高库存料件的帐，卡，物和单证输入的准确率。

sentences.english: It puts forward new demands to domestic energy efficiency chillers.
sentences.chinese: 这对国内冷水机组能效比的提高提出了新的要求。

sentences.english: The prevalence rates increased with increasing gravidity or parity.
sentences.chinese: 出生缺陷发生率随着孕产次的增加而明显提高。

definition: to decline/to drop/to fall/to go down/to decrease
